QuestData.Title: Korrath's Grimoire: Gyadrek
QuestData.Description:
<These appear to be a collection of pages from a tome studying the denizens of the Maw in unsettling detail.
No doubt Ve'nari would wish to peruse this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Korrath's Grimoire: Gyadrek to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Despite how long I have been here, there is still much about the creatures of the Maw that remains unknown to me.
Sometimes I have to wonder if it is better that way.
